title: 20.) Top 40 Countdown - Am I Overthinking Things?
description:
Victoria is 22 and having sex with a guy without a commitment or the confidence that he really cares about her. - Dr. Laura: "Meaningless sex has a negative effect on your psyche, your feelings and your future."
